item.title: plgd on K8S
item.description: In this section, you can find several examples of how to deploy plgd hub with external OAuth2.0 Server or with mocked one for development purposes. Getting started In our GitHub repository you can find charts/ folder with plgd hub Helm chart. This chart is automatically published to the Helm registry https://charts.plgd.dev during the release. Version of the chart is in sync with the appversion, matching the release tag (e.g. 2.
